#summary Documentation of the Rend_Factory subclasses.

= Factories =
Rend includes a number of factories for easily creating common objects based on values in the configuration file.

 * Zend_Acl
 * [Rend_Factory_Auth Zend_Auth]
 * Zend_Auth_Adapter
 * [Rend_Factory_Database Zend_Db_Adapter]
 * Zend_Log
 * Zend_Lucene
 * [Rend_Factory_Mail Zend_Mail]
 * Zend_Mail_Transport
 * Zend_Translate
 * Zend_View
